description.full:
A Topic object allows you to interact with a Google Cloud Pub/Sub topic. To
get this object, you will use the methods on the pubsub object,
{@linkcode module:pubsub#topic} and {@linkcode module:pubsub#createTopic}.
description.summary:
A Topic object allows you to interact with a Google Cloud Pub/Sub topic. To
get this object, you will use the methods on the pubsub object,
{@linkcode module:pubsub#topic} and {@linkcode module:pubsub#createTopic}.

description.full: Format a message object as the upstream API expects it.
description.summary: Format a message object as the upstream API expects it.

description.full:
Format the name of a topic. A Topic's full name is in the format of
/topics/{projectId}/{name}.
description.summary:
Format the name of a topic. A Topic's full name is in the format of
/topics/{projectId}/{name}.

description.full: Publish the provided message. A message can be of any type.
description.summary: Publish the provided message. A message can be of any type.

description.full: Delete the topic. This will also delete any subscriptions to this topic.
description.summary: Delete the topic. This will also delete any subscriptions to this topic.

description.full:
Get a list of the subscriptions registered to this topic. You may optionally
provide a query object as the first argument to customize the response.

Your provided callback will either be invoked with an error object, if an API
error occurred, or an array of {@linkcode module:pubsub/subscription}
objects.
description.summary:
Get a list of the subscriptions registered to this topic. You may optionally
provide a query object as the first argument to customize the response.
description.body:
Your provided callback will either be invoked with an error object, if an API
error occurred, or an array of {@linkcode module:pubsub/subscription}
objects.

tags.name: options.ackDeadlineSeconds
tags.description: • The maximum time after receiving a message that you must ack a message before it is redelivered.

tags.name: options.autoAck
tags.description: • Automatically acknowledge the message once it's pulled. (default: false)

tags.name: options.interval
tags.description: • Interval in milliseconds to check for new messages. (default: 10)

description.full:
Create a subscription to this topic. You may optionally provide an object to
customize the subscription.

Your provided callback will either be invoked with an error object, if an API
error occurred, or a {@linkcode module:pubsub/subscription} object.
description.summary:
Create a subscription to this topic. You may optionally provide an object to
customize the subscription.
description.body:
Your provided callback will either be invoked with an error object, if an API
error occurred, or a {@linkcode module:pubsub/subscription} object.

tags.name: options.autoAck
tags.description: • Automatically acknowledge the message once it's pulled.

tags.name: options.interval
tags.description: • Interval in milliseconds to check for new messages.

description.full:
Create a Subscription object in reference to an existing subscription. This
command by itself will not run any API requests. You will receive a
{@linkcode module:pubsub/subscription} object, which will allow you to
interact with your subscription.
description.summary:
Create a Subscription object in reference to an existing subscription. This
command by itself will not run any API requests. You will receive a
{@linkcode module:pubsub/subscription} object, which will allow you to
interact with your subscription.
